pages.text: Potion modifiers are blocks that can use source upgrade potions that pass through them. They take potions from a jar directly above them, and output to a jar directly below them. Source is provided by any nearby jars. Potion extenders will increase the duration of any potion by one minute. Potion amplifiers will increase the level of any potion by 1, but halve the amount of potion.

pages.name: Potion Modifiers
pages.text: Upgrades the stats of potions that pass through it.
